text.atmosphericfauna.cloth_missing: Cloth Config is not installed. Install cloth-config to edit settings.
option.atmosphericfauna.spawn_range_from: Sets the maximum distance from the player within which ambient fauna can spawn.
option.atmosphericfauna.spawn_tick_delay: Sets the delay (in ticks) between ambient spawn attempts.
option.atmosphericfauna.attempts_per_tic: Sets the number of spawn attempts per tick.
option.atmosphericfauna.search_radius.to: Sets the radius around the chosen spawn point to search for a valid spawn position.
option.atmosphericfauna.spawn_below_sea_: Sets if bird particles can spawn below the Sea Level.
option.atmosphericfauna.max_active_birds: Sets the maximum number of active bird particles in the world at any given time.
option.atmosphericfauna.max_active_crows: Sets the maximum number of active crow particles in the world at any given time.
option.atmosphericfauna.debug_text_spawn: Enables console debug text for ambient spawning in the world.
option.atmosphericfauna.debug_text_birds: Enables console debug text for bird particles in the world.
